content:
Detective Petrov looks at you and says: "The main suspect is a man named Johann Bauer, he is one of the leaders of the Kaltes Klirren. He has a long criminal record, but this is the first time he's been connected to something as serious as this. Our informant tells us that Bauer is hiding out in one of the abandoned factories on the outskirts of the city, we think he might be manufacturing the drug there as well.

"Our next steps are to gather a team, and raid the factory. We need to catch Bauer and his associates and put a stop to this crime wave. We also need to find any evidence that can connect him to the murders. We need to move fast, before Bauer and his gang have the chance to destroy any evidence or escape."

As part of Knight Errant, you and Detective Petrov are responsible for maintaining law and order in New Berlin. You both are determined to bring Bauer and his associates to justice and put an end to their criminal activities. The two of you quickly make a plan and gather a team, ready to raid the factory and bring Bauer to justice.
